channel.title: Owner " " has logged on
channel.description:
How do u make it so when someone logs on it says Owner "Name" has logg on
and one for Co-owner "Name has logged on
and where would i put them?

item.title: Owner " " has logged on
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Add it where it loads the moreinfo file and shit like that, OR initialize method.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner " " has logged on
item.dc:creator: @zezimaisme111 zezimaisme111
item.description:
@zezimaisme111 wrote:

search in client.java what it says and add a bit like this:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your name here")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in";
^^
dont put your name in it, leave it how it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner " " has logged on
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME”)){
playerHandler.messageToAll(“MASSAGE HERER”);
}

add it around what it says when you log in

Read full topic

item.title: Owner " " has logged on
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Never mind, add the following. Search: //if(returnCode == 2 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("_"))

//PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.”;

After you find the //if(returnCode blah blah blah, then right under it, add the one above!

Read full topic

item.title: Owner " " has logged on

item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

Wow…I said when it says someone logged on it would say “Owner (Name) has logged on”

Not a dumb NPC…

Try reading…

item.title: Owner " " has logged on
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

well u could put the npc any where u want and u would need to use a code like this
if (npcs[i].npcType == 637) {
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner (as just loged in) ";
this is only a fraction of the code as cause i dont belive in giveing the code to people unless its super inpossable and hard but there is only one other part to this missing the function to search for player and if return = trun (text update) owner (“blank”) is on
if return == false (text update) (“owner is offline”)

Read full topic
